remarks: Member of the domain of the greatest lower bound function of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
glbeldm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
glbeldm.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
glbeldm.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
glbeldm.p $e |- ( ps <-> ( A. y e. S x .<_ y /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S z .<_ y -> z .<_ x ) ) ) $.
glbeldm.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
glbeldm $p |- ( ph -> ( S e. dom G <-> ( S C_ B /\ E! x e. B ps ) ) ) $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
